casebody.data:
Charles A. Watkins v. The New York Central & H. R. R. Co. Decided May 7, 1888. Submission of case under section 1279, Code of Civil Procedure. Frederick Hemming, for plaintiff. H. E. Kenney, for defendant.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

There should be judgment for defendant with costs.
